title: Transfer Patient to ICU
description: A patient on a medical floor has destabilized and needs to be transferred to the Intensive Care Unit (ICU).

tasks.description: Receive the urgent transfer order from the physician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the order to transfer the patient to the ICU.

tasks.description: Find an available bed in the ICU.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the bed management tool to locate and assign an available ICU bed.

tasks.description: Process the ADT transfer message, updating the patient's location from the medical floor to the ICU.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the patient's location, ensuring all downstream systems are notified of the transfer.
